com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook

Class RuleBook<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.RuleBook<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecisionBook
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class RuleBook<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    RuleBook is an abstract class that follows the Template Method design pattern, leaving the defineRules() method implementation for subclasses. This class facilitates the aggregation and chaining together of Rules.

      void addRule(Rule<T> rule)
      Deprecated. 
      The addRule() method adds a rule to the end of the Rules chain.
      protected abstract void defineRules()
      Deprecated. 
      this is where the rules can be specified in the subclass; it will be executed by run().
      RuleBook<T> given(Fact<T>... facts)
      Deprecated. 
      The given() method accepts the Facts for this RuleBook.
      RuleBook<T> given(java.lang.String name, T value)
      Deprecated. 
      The given() method accepts a key/value pair as a Fact for this RuleBook.
      void run()
      Deprecated. 
      The run() method adds the rules [via defineRules()] and runs the rules as long as at least one rule was added.

      • run

        public final void run()
        Deprecated. 
        The run() method adds the rules [via defineRules()] and runs the rules as long as at least one rule was added.

      • given

        @SafeVarargs
public final RuleBook<T> given(Fact<T>... facts)
        Deprecated. 
        The given() method accepts the Facts for this RuleBook. The facts passed in will also be applied to all rules added to this RuleBook.
        Parameters:
        facts - Facts to be added to the RuleBook and applied to all the Rules in the RuleBook
        Returns:
        the current RuleBook object

      • given

        public RuleBook<T> given(java.lang.String name,
                         T value)
        Deprecated. 
        The given() method accepts a key/value pair as a Fact for this RuleBook.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Fact
        value - the value of the Fact
        Returns:
        the current RuleBook object

      • addRule

        public void addRule(Rule<T> rule)
        Deprecated. 
        The addRule() method adds a rule to the end of the Rules chain.
        Parameters:
        rule - the Rule to be added

      • defineRules

        protected abstract void defineRules()
        Deprecated. 
        this is where the rules can be specified in the subclass; it will be executed by run().
